pr_title: HDDS-3850. Update the admin document to let user know how to show the status of all rules.

timeline.message: HDDS-3850. Modify the admin document to let user know how to show the status of all rules.

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
             * `ozone admin safemode`: You can force to leave/enter from/to safemode and check the safe mode status, with `--verbose` option, will print status of all rules.
          
          
            
             * `ozone admin safemode`: You can check the safe mode status and force to leave/enter from/to safemode,  `--verbose` option will print validation status of all rules that evaluate safemode status.
timeline.author: dineshchitlangia
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -24,7 +24,7 @@ Ozone Admin command (`ozone admin`) is a collection of tools intended to be used
 
 And quick overview about the available functionalities:
 
- * `ozone admin safemode`: You can check the safe mode status and force to leave/enter from/to safemode.
+ * `ozone admin safemode`: You can force to leave/enter from/to safemode and check the safe mode status, with `--verbose` option, will print status of all rules.
